pullrequest.title: Implement generation of XML Schema files (issue #2)

content.raw:
The test's should now pass. Here is what I did:

1. The PR2 model `<script>` definitions were missing the `<name>` child elements. This fixes the `Gazebo/<color>` problem.

1. Updated the `types.xsd` file to handle floating point numbers.

1. The urdf -> sdf converter outputs `<velocity_decay/>` elements. This conflicts with the original SDF definition that stated `<velocity_decay>` must have two child elements. I updated `link.sdf` to make the aforementioned elements optional.

1.  Update the `model.sdf` and `world.sdf` definitions to capture the allowable children of an `<include>` element.


With [Jenkins](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/SDFormat/job/gazebo-any-sdformat-any-devel-trusty-amd64/20/)
content.html:
The test's should now pass. Here is what I did:

  1. The PR2 model <script> definitions were missing the <name> child elements. This fixes the Gazebo/<color> problem.

  2. Updated the types.xsd file to handle floating point numbers.

  3. The urdf -> sdf converter outputs <velocity_decay/> elements. This conflicts with the original SDF definition that stated <velocity_decay> must have two child elements. I updated link.sdf to make the aforementioned elements optional.

  4. Update the model.sdf and world.sdf definitions to capture the allowable children of an <include> element.

With Jenkins
